page.title: 18AN INTERVIEW WITH CHAS.
page.content: Whilst making a survey on our area we came across a pop singer,{CHAS,}of the pop group,"Chas & Dave".He very kindly allowed us to interview him about the area. {Q.What made you decide to live in this {area and how much land do you own ? A.I have lived here for 3 yrs and own 4 acres of grazing land.I decided on it because it is relaxing after my hectic profession,& it's easy to commute to London. {Q.How did Bakers End get its name? } A.Bakers End was as far as the baker would deliver the bread in the old days {Q.What advantages are there,in living {in Bakers End,rather than London?} A.You get the best of both worlds.I enjoy the peace of the countryside, yet I can be right in the centre of London within 1 hour.
